text: The flag of Słubice () has three horizontal stripes, the big strip is red and two small strips white with the coat of arms of Słubice. It was adopted in 1998. ==Design and symbolism== The meaning of the colors of the flag are as follows: Name Color HEX Code Red #C90016 White #FFFFFF ==References== Słubice Category:Flags with coats of arms
title: Flag of Słubice
